mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo ( userId, todoTitle, todoContent, todoDate, repeatableYN, repeatUnit, startDate, endDate, weekDay, monthDay, finish ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{todoTitle}, #{todoContent}, #{todoDate}, #{repeatableYN}, #{repeatUnit}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{weekDay}, #{monthDay}, #{finish} );
